definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: Lishui City Planning Exhibition Hall warmly welcomes your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 麗水市城市規劃展覽館竭誠歡迎您的到來。

sentences.english: His work hangs in galleries and museums around the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品掛滿了世界各地的展覽館和博物館。

sentences.english: Opening Ceremony was successfully held after the round trip of lion performance at the exhibition hall .
sentences.chinese: 開幕典禮在醒獅帶領與會者到展覽館繞場一週後完成。

sentences.english: A: The audience will be composed largely of senior managers and management consultants of meeting and exhibition venues.
sentences.chinese: 聽衆主要是會場和展覽館的高級經理或管理顧問。

sentences.english: Many newly-unearthed cultural relics are set out in the exhibition hall.
sentences.chinese: 展覽館裏陳列着許多新出土的文物。

sentences.english: Many newly– unearthed cultural relics are set forth in the exhibition hall.
sentences.chinese: 展覽館裏陳列着許多新出土的文物。

sentences.english: We led by xu teacher, first came to the calligraphy exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我們在許老師帶領下，首先來到了書法展覽館。

sentences.english: She had a morbid detestation of Li Hua's commercial schemes.
sentences.chinese: 她對展覽館的商業計劃很不以爲然。

sentences.english: The Getty Images exhibition is at the Movieum of London in County Hall.
sentences.chinese: 該圖片在倫敦展覽館國力大廳展出，無圖片介紹。

sentences.english: In central city and the art galleries with various valuable rarities .
sentences.chinese: 心漂亮的雕塑，還有滿是稀世珍寶的藝術展覽館。

sentences.english: There is still the exhibition hall of Siping heroic deed in the cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 陵園內還辟有四平英烈事蹟展覽館。

sentences.english: Rui and Tang culture and art galleries where?
sentences.chinese: 瑞和堂文化藝術展覽館在哪裏？

sentences.english: CD Blues Cafe & Bar, East Third Ring Rd near Agricultural Exhibition Center, Sanlitun.
sentences.chinese: 東三環北路，近農業展覽館，三里屯。

sentences.english: Central city and the art galleries with various valuable rarities.
sentences.chinese: 心漂亮的雕塑，還有滿是稀世珍寶的藝術展覽館。
